name: places/ChIJlzZeUKZYwokRyCPQC6jA7ec
formattedAddress: 1515 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1515 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029-7109, USA

originalText.text:
I am writing this review in response to the slanderous and cruel reviews previously posted (note: most of these reviews are several years old...)

My family and I have been patrons of this establishment for over 18 years. The woman who works on the weekends is the main reason we have been taking our laundry there for so long. She is highly professional, kind, organized, hardworking, caring and conscientious. She does our laundry as if she were doing it for her own family. That is the level of pride that she takes in her work.

Reading older reviews was not only disheartening but also anger-provoking. The slanderous comments made were dehumanizing. Because of the derogatory and vile name-calling, I immediately discredit the veracity of their content and the characters of their authors.

Let's demonstrate some HUMANITY for hardworking people, immigrants, black and brown folx, and marginalized folx who are doing their best to support their families and earn a living while doing difficult and often thankless jobs. I hope that Banaco management recognizes and takes care of their loyal and long-time employees.

As members of this community we have an obligation to look out for each other. We MUST do better.

originalText.text: Great staff. Fast service. It is not a dry cleaners though. Its a laundromat.

text.text: Great staff. Fast service. It is not a dry cleaners though. Its a laundromat.

originalText.text: The rudest woman on Earth works there and will ruin the rest of your day just since the moment you enter the door. Go anywhere else.

text.text: The rudest woman on Earth works there and will ruin the rest of your day just since the moment you enter the door. Go anywhere else.

originalText.text: Great staff, quick service, affordablely priced. A+
